Name: BoxShowFan
About the game: This is a small game of clicking and developing, collect gold coins by clicking, get monsters, train monsters, and then defeat monsters. The current version is open: Monster Feeding: Make monsters grow by feeding carrots. The first version of combat: first-person bullet screen combat. Monster Breeding: It is possible for monsters of the same species to breed together. Combat system: Attacks of the same attribute will cancel each other. (Ignore attack power) Left-click normal attack probability to trigger powerful skills. Right-click area powerful attack. space fast charge Breeding system: Monsters of the same species of the opposite sex are raised in the same room to have a probability of breeding. Monster training: Put monsters in the room, they will grow automatically, and feeding carrots can speed up the growth.
